verbose_text: Curcumin has been shown to prevent the fibrillation of alpha-synuclein at the earliest stage of the aggregation process, as well as the fibrillation of the globular protein hen egg-white lysozyme (HEWL) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: Curcumin has been shown to prevent the fibrillation of alpha-synuclein at the earliest stage of the aggregation process, as well as the fibrillation of the globular protein hen egg-white lysozyme
